subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginóbili scored a season-high 37 points to help the host San Antonio Spurs overcome the absence of Tim Duncan to beat the Dallas Mavericks, 97-95, last night.
snippet: Manu Ginóbili scored a season-high 37 points to help the host San Antonio Spurs overcome the absence of Tim Duncan to beat the Dallas Mavericks, 97-95, last night.
